easy.q: I have a tail but no body. I’m not an animal, I’m a coin in a pocket. What am I?
easy.hint: Small metal friend you flip in games

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think of a word that changes when you add letters

hard.q: Two people stand on opposite ends of a bridge. They move toward each other at the same speed. When they meet, who is closer to the start and finish? Explain briefly.
hard.a: Neither; they meet in the middle exactly.
hard.hint: Consider distances from each end to the meeting point
